;+ ; Normalize an input array by the L1, L2, or L Inf norm ; ; :Categories: ; util ; ; :Params: ; array, in, required, type="fltarr(n,1)" ; array to normalize ; norm_type, in, required, type=string ; normalization function to use ; ; :Returns: ; normalized copy of array ; ; :Examples: ; The following code will normalize the input array x by the L2 norm ; ; normed_x = hiihat_normalize_array(x, 'Euclidean (L 2)') ; ; :Author: David Ray Thompson and Brian D. Bue ; :History: ; 2009 (DRT): initially written in hiihat_preprocess.pro ; Dec 05, 2010 (BDB): moved into separate routine ; ; :Copyright: ; Copyright 2010, by the California Institute of Technology. User has the responsibility to obtain export ; licenses, or other export authority as may be required before exporting such ; information to foreign countries or providing access to foreign persons. ;- function hiihat_normalize_array, array, norm_type ;handle wrong data size entered for array ; b=size(array) ; if b[0] lt 0 or b[0] gt 1 then begin ; print, "Error... norm can only handle a vector" ; exit ; endif ; handle no norm requested if norm_type eq 'None' then return, array ; handle empty array if total(array) eq 0 then return, array if norm_type eq 'Area (L 1)' then return, array/float(abs(total(array ))) if norm_type eq 'Euclidean (L 2)' then return, array/sqrt (total(array*array)) if norm_type eq 'Peak (L inf)' then return, array/float(max(array)) end
